attributes.mlflow.spanInputs: {"prompt": "Create Cisco IOS XR 7.0.1 telemetry model-driven configuration to monitor QoS policy-map statistics (interfaces, class counters, drops). Use gRPC with no TLS. Telemetry server is 192.0.2.113 on port 57500. Choose relevant sensor-paths."}
attributes.mlflow.spanOutputs:
"telemetry model-driven
 sensor-group QOS-POLICY-STATS
  sensor-path Cisco-IOS-XR-qos-ma-sat-cfg:qos-policy-statistics/interfaces/interface
  sensor-path Cisco-IOS-XR-qos-ma-sat-cfg:qos-policy-statistics/interfaces/interface/class-stats/class-stat
  sensor-path Cisco-IOS-XR-qos-ma-sat-cfg:qos-policy-statistics/interfaces/interface/class-stats/class-stat/drops
 !
 destination-group DG-GRPC
  address-family ipv4
   destination 192.0.2.113
    port 57500
    encoding self-describing-gpb
    protocol grpc no-tls
 !
 subscription SUB-QOS-POLICY-STATS
  sensor-group-id QOS-POLICY-STATS sample-interval 30000
  destination-group-id DG-GRPC
 !"
